mapper.update: update message set state=#{state} where msgid=#{msgid}
mapper.select: select a.msgid, msgtopic, msgcontents, msgtime, msgip, a.theid, c.thename,a.userid, username, realname, sex, city FROM message a LEFT JOIN user b ON a.userid=b.userid LEFT JOIN theme c ON a.theid=c.theid where a.msgid=#{id}

SELECT m.msgid,msgtopic,msgcontents,msgtime,msgip,m.userid, username,realname,sex,city, accessCount,replyCount FROM message m LEFT JOIN user u ON u.userid=m.userid LEFT JOIN count c ON c.msgid=m.msgid WHERE m.state >= 0 ORDER BY m.msgtime DESC

SELECT m.msgid,msgtopic,msgcontents,msgtime,msgip,m.userid, username,realname,sex,city, accessCount,replyCount FROM message m LEFT JOIN user u ON u.userid=m.userid LEFT JOIN count c ON c.msgid=m.msgid WHERE m.state>=0 ORDER BY c.accessCount DESC

SELECT b.msgid, msgtopic, msgcontents, msgtime, msgip, b.state, b.theid, a.thename, b.userid, username, realname, sex, city, d.accessCount, d.replyCount, max(e.replytime) as replytime FROM theme a LEFT JOIN message b ON a.theid = b.theid LEFT JOIN user c ON b.userid = c.userid LEFT JOIN count d ON b.msgid = d.msgid LEFT JOIN reply e on b.msgid = e.msgid WHERE b.state >= 0 AND b.msgtime IN (SELECT MAX(msgtime) FROM message f WHERE f.state >= 0 AND b.theid = f.theid) GROUP BY b.msgid, msgtopic, msgcontents, msgtime, msgip, b.state, b.theid, a.thename, a.count, b.userid, username, realname, sex, city, d.accessCount, d.replyCount ORDER BY a.count DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM message WHERE msgtime > #{startDate} AND msgtime < #{endDate}
